messages.subject: Constipation reply
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Thanks for all the ideas about constipation.  I am thinking about now writing a book with all the ideas.. (just kidding...) Kiere is doing better. Part of
messages.messageBody:
Hi, Thanks for all the ideas about constipation. I am thinking about now
writing a book with all the ideas.. (just kidding...)
Kiere is doing better.
Part of it is her choice to want to poo. Is that unusual? Almost seems like
a control issue at age 3, finding her freedom.
So before any remedies were implemented, she had deficated. Imagine that!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
